20110106150540.000|20110106150541.000|CC1|THAT IS SOMETHING THAT YOU HAVE 
20110106150541.000|20110106150543.000|CC1|BEEN A MAJOR ADVOCATE FOR, BUT  
20110106150543.000|20110106150544.000|CC1|GIVEN THE FACT THAT THE

20110106150551.000|20110106150553.000|CC1|>> WELL, BECAUSE THAT'S AN ISSUE
20110106150553.000|20110106150554.000|CC1|THAT PEOPLE REALLY REACTED      
20110106150554.000|20110106150555.000|CC1|AGAINST.                        
20110106150555.000|20110106150557.000|CC1|THEY WERE VERY UPSET THAT VERY  
20110106150557.000|20110106150558.000|CC1|FEW MEMBERS EVEN BOTHERED TO    
20110106150558.000|20110106150600.000|CC1|READ THE HEALTH CARE BILL.      
20110106150600.000|20110106150601.000|CC1|MOST OF US DIDN'T EVEN HAVE A   
20110106150601.000|20110106150603.000|CC1|CHANCE TO READ IT BECAUSE IT WAS
20110106150603.000|20110106150604.000|CC1|PUT IN FRONT OF US AT SUCH A    
20110106150604.000|20110106150607.000|CC1|LATE DATE, AND THEN WE FOUND OUT
20110106150607.000|20110106150609.000|CC1|THAT THE BILL IS COSTING FAR    
20110106150609.000|20110106150610.000|CC1|MORE THAN WHAT WE WERE TOLD IT  
20110106150610.000|20110106150611.000|CC1|WAS GOING TO.                   
20110106150611.000|20110106150613.000|CC1|AND IT IS NOW WORKING TO        
20110106150613.000|20110106150615.000|CC1|INCREASE PEOPLE'S HEALTH CARE   
20110106150615.000|20110106150616.000|CC1|PREMIUMS, THEIR PRIVATE         
20110106150616.000|20110106150617.000|CC1|PREMIUMS, AT ASTOUNDING RATES   
20110106150617.000|20110106150620.000|CC1|ALL ACROSS THE COUNTRY.         
20110106150620.000|20110106150621.000|CC1|IN OTHER WORDS, IT'S NOT        
20110106150621.000|20110106150622.000|CC1|DELIVERING BY COST CUTTING THE  
20110106150622.000|20110106150623.000|CC1|WAY WE WERE TOLD --             
20110106150623.000|20110106150624.000|CC1|>> BUT IF YOU HAVE NO CHANCE TO 
20110106150624.000|20110106150625.000|CC1|REALLY REPEAL IT, WHY GO THROUGH
20110106150625.000|20110106150627.000|CC1|THIS EXERCISE?
